summary: Makes the Dark Brotherhood Armour\'s blacks blacker and reds redder, without altering the armour\'s design.
descriptionHtml: I just got to the Dark Brotherhood hideout and received my armour and it wasn\'t dark enough for my tastes. I looked around and noone seems to have made a darker texture mod for it that doesn\'t completely change the armour. This simply makes the blacks blacker and the reds redder without changing the actual design of the armour.
author: Thepal
